title: Baby, I'm Yours
description: Get ready to fall in love with the town of Sweetness, Georgia, in this short prequel to Stephanie Bond's  SOUTHERN ROADS  series.Emory Maxwell has come home to the small town of Sweetness, Georgia, with one goal in mind--to get his childhood sweetheart Shelby Moon to marry him. They've been in love since the second grade, but Shelby's father is determined to keep his daughter in Sweetness, not moving around the country as a soldier's wife. No matter what she chooses, Shelby knows she'll hurt one of the men she loves.But when a tornado rips through town, will she and Emory lose their chance to be together forever?(  This story is novella-length and not available in print.)In Stephanie Bond's  SOUTHERN ROADS  romance series, three ex-military brothers set out to rebuild their hometown in the Georgia mountains destroyed ten years ago by an F-5 tornado. All the stories in the  SOUTHERN ROADS  romance series, in BABY, I'M YOURS   (prequel novella) BABY, DRIVE SOUTH BABY, COME HOMEBABY, DON'T GOBABY, I'M BACK   (short story) BABY, HOLD ON   (novella)BABY, IT'S YOU  (novella)   Should I read the  SOUTHERN ROADS  stories in order?   The stories unfold chronologically as the town is destroyed and being rebuilt, so yes, it's best to read the stories in order.
author: Stephanie Bond
